document.full_text: harmon killebrew issued a modest farewell on friday in which the slugger of 573 home runs said his battle against esophageal cancer had come to an end.
document.title: an ailing killebrew simply says farewell
lines_and_colors: harmon killebrew issued a modest farewell on friday in which the slugger of 573 home runs said his battle against esophageal cancer had come to an end.
